thread.section_title: Anthony Martial not named in France’s latest squad as Monaco’s Kylian Mbappe earns first call-up – Metro
thread.title: Anthony Martial not named in France’s latest squad as Monaco’s Kylian Mbappe earns first call-up
thread.title_full: Anthony Martial not named in France’s latest squad as Monaco’s Kylian Mbappe earns first call-up

author: Chris Davie
title: Anthony Martial not named in France’s latest squad as Monaco’s Kylian Mbappe earns first call-up
text:
Anthony Martial has not been named in France’s latest squad. (AFP/Getty Images) Anthony Martial has not been named in France’s latest squad, while four players have been handed their first call-up including Monaco forward Kylian Mbappe.
GOALKEEPERS 
Hugo Lloris (Tottenham), Benoit Costil (Rennes), Alphonse Areola (PSG)
DEFENDERS 
Layvin Kurzawa (PSG), Benjamin Mendy (Monaco), Laurent Koscielny (Arsenal), Adil Rami (Sevilla), Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona), Presnel Kimpembe (PSG), Bacary Sagna (Manchester City), Djibril Sidibe (Monaco)
MIDFIELDERS 
Blaise Matuidi (PSG), N’Golo Kante (Chelsea), Adrien Rabiot (PSG), Paul Pogba (Manchester United), Dimitri Payet (Marseille), Corentin Tolisso (Lyon)
STRIKERS 
Olivier Giroud (Arsenal), Ousmane Dembele (Borussia Dortmund), Antoine Griezmann (Atletico Madrid), Thomas Lemar (AS Monaco), Kevin Gameiro (Atletico Madrid), Kylian Mbappe (Monaco), Florian Thauvin (Marseille)
MORE: Mancheter United striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic talks up potential return to Serie A 
MORE: Chelsea goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois aims thinly-veiled dig at Manchester United boss Jose Mourinho
